General.Name: Balrampur Chini Mills Limited
General.Description: Balrampur Chini Mills Limited, an integrated sugar manufacturing company, manufactures and sells sugar in India. It operates through Sugar, Distillery, and others segments. The company also offers molasses, industrial alcohol, ethanol, and bagasse; and agricultural fertilizers, such as soil conditioner, granulated potash, etc. In addition, it is involved in the generation and sale of electricity. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.

8.Name: Mr. P.  Sandeep
